content: I'm having some issues with fin nipping in my community tank, specifically with the platies towards the neon tetras. I've tried rearranging the decorations, but it's still a problem. Do you have any advice on how to resolve this? By the way, I cycled the tank with a mixture of tetra safe start and seachem prime, and after 2 weeks, I started adding the fish, and they're doing pretty well otherwise.
